biography_text: CHAFFETZ, Jason, a Representative from Utah; born in Los Gatos, Santa Clara County, Calif., March 26, 1967; B.A., Brigham Young University, Provo, Utah, 1989; business executive; chief of staff, Utah Governor John Huntsman, 2004; member of the Utah Valley board of trustees, 2007-2008; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Eleventh and to the four succeeding Congresses until his resignation on June 30, 2017 (January 3, 2009-June 30, 2017); chair, Committee on Oversight and Government Reform (One Hundred Fourteenth and One Hundred Fifteenth Congresses).
